hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
git clone https://github.com/subutai-io/agent && cd agent && git checkout --track origin/no-snap && rm -rf .git* && cd ..
git clone https://github.com/happyaron/subutai-agent && cp -r subutai-agent/debian/ agent/ VER=6.4.12+$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S) cd agent && sed -i "s/quit/native/" debian/source/format dch -v $VER -D stable "Test build for $VER" 1>/dev/null 2>/dev/null dpkg-buildpackage -rfakeroot`
#rm -rf agent subutai-agent
